title: How much honor do i need to get to LV up???
body:
I have playing fiora {{champion:114}} 
and geting MVP, and keep geting honor but it still not LV up, so how much do i need to LV up my honor to LV 3(i have play 100 game each week and get honoer amost all the game)

replies.body: The key to leveling up your honor is just consistency!  There's no visible meter to see how close you are to leveling.  Just keep playing as an honorable summoner, and you'll make it there!
